oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni and Tamme give the names of some plants and animals found in their country. This includes some information about them, as well as if and how they are eaten. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: plants and animals
